Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Black and red goblet with a small flat base, straight mouth and simple lip. The outside surface, which bears a red slip except near the mouth, has been burnished horizontally, though the gloss has quite faded. The inside surface, which is black, shows very distinct marks of a vertical and horizontal burnish.
